text: (nampikkaiyalarkale!) Inrumutal nallavai anaittum unkalukku (unpatarku) akumakkappattu vittana. Vetattai utaiyavarkalin unavum unkalukku akumanate! Unkal unavum avarkalukku akumanate! Nampikkai konta karputaiya penkalaiyum, unkalukku munnar vetam kotukkappatta karputaiya penkalaiyum, vipaccarikalakavo vaippattikalakavo kollamal, avarkalukkuk kotukka ventiya maharkalaiyum kotuttu (tirumanam ceytu) kolvatu (unkalukku akum). Evan nampikkai kontatan pinnar (inta cattankalai) nirakarikkirano avanutaiya narceyalkal niccayamaka alintuvitum. Marumaiyilo avan (murrilum) nastamataintavarkaliltan iruppan
